name: Planet: Critical
description:
Humans have invaded your planet in search of a valuable mineral. In their process of mining it, they are destroying your home and slowly bringing the planet to destruction. Your goal is to stop them, acquiring any gear necessary to stop their mining operation.

Planet: Critical is a bullet hell game where you defeat enemies to get better loot. Explore a world with 3 dungeons and play 3 unique classes.

This game was made as a prototype for a multiplayer game. It is not a finished product. Presented at the Florida Polytechnic University Game Expo Nov. 2019.
